name: Crypto clicker (Rubèn Salvador, RodrigoDPL, Salt4f, Alba Lupianez)
name_original: Crypto clicker (Rubèn Salvador, RodrigoDPL, Salt4f, Alba Lupianez)
description:
Crypto Clicker

Are you tired of working every day and no having time for yourself or your family? Don't waste no time! Welcome to Crypto Clicker, our brand new stunning game. Become your own boss by earning every crypto in the world. Use your knowledge and skills to climb above the top of success and bring the concept of cryptobro to the next level. 

This game has been made for Indie Spain Jam in less than a week. We're proud to show you our small prototype of a simple and fun game we've put some love into.  Here's our team:

  • Production and game design: Rubèn Salvador
  • Programming: Sergio Camps and Rodrigo de Pedro
  • Art: Alba Lupiañez

Feel free to comment and share whatever you think about our game. We hope you enjoy it!
